items.title: Skate 2

cpu.spuBlockSize: Mega seems a bit slower with more fluctuation in FPS.

knownIssues: Objects can fall through the ground randomly - Issue 11936: When in-game, objects such as rubbish bins can fall through the ground then appear in the normal position and fall through the ground again repeatedly. A workaround for it is to use ASMJIT for SPU Decoding; rebooting the game can also fix it.
items.notes: Netplay testing: For the complete list of games tested with RPCN, please check the RPCN Compatibility List.

items.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 2

cpu.spuBlockSize: Anything other than Safe causes freezing.

knownIssues: Broken Font - Fixed by PR 13158: Previously text rendered as squares (Issue 8718, now marked fixed).
items.notes: Netplay testing: For the complete list of games tested with RPCN, please check the RPCN Compatibility List.
